lowpanMIB.name: lowpanMIB
lowpanMIB.organization: IETF IPv6 over Networks of Resource-constrained Nodes Working Group
lowpanMIB.contactinfo: WG Email: 6lo@ietf.org WG Web: http://tools.ietf.org/wg/6lo/ Juergen Schoenwaelder Jacobs University Bremen Email: j.schoenwaelder@jacobs-university.de Anuj Sehgal Jacobs University Bremen Email: s.anuj@jacobs-university.de Tina Tsou Huawei Technologies Email: tina.tsou.zouting@huawei.com Cathy Zhou Huawei Technologies Email: cathyzhou@huawei.com
lowpanMIB.description: The MIB module for monitoring nodes implementing the IPv6 over Low-Power Wireless Personal Area Networks (6LoWPAN) protocol. Copyright (c) 2014 IETF Trust and the persons identified as authors of the code. All rights reserved. Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without modification, is permitted pursuant to, and subject to the license terms contained in, the Simplified BSD License set forth in Section 4.c of the IETF Trust's Legal Provisions Relating to IETF Documents (http://trustee.ietf.org/license-info).

lowpanReasmTimeout.name: lowpanReasmTimeout
lowpanReasmTimeout.description: The maximum number of seconds that received fragments are held while they are awaiting reassembly at this entity.

lowpanInReceives.name: lowpanInReceives
lowpanInReceives.description: The total number of 6LoWPAN datagrams received, including those received in error.

lowpanInHdrErrors.name: lowpanInHdrErrors
lowpanInHdrErrors.description: The number of received 6LoWPAN datagrams discarded due to errors in their headers, including unknown dispatch values.

lowpanInMeshReceives.name: lowpanInMeshReceives
lowpanInMeshReceives.description: The number of received 6LoWPAN datagrams with a MESH header.

lowpanInMeshForwds.name: lowpanInMeshForwds
lowpanInMeshForwds.description: The number of received 6LoWPAN datagrams requiring mesh forwarding.

lowpanInMeshDelivers.name: lowpanInMeshDelivers
lowpanInMeshDelivers.description: The number of received 6LoWPAN datagrams with a MESH header delivered to the local system.

lowpanInReasmReqds.name: lowpanInReasmReqds
lowpanInReasmReqds.description: The number of received 6LoWPAN fragments that needed to be reassembled. This includes both FRAG1 and FRAGN 6LoWPAN datagrams.

lowpanInReasmFails.name: lowpanInReasmFails
lowpanInReasmFails.description: The number of failures detected by the re-assembly algorithm (e.g., timeouts). Note that this is not necessarily a count of discarded 6LoWPAN fragments since implementations can lose track of the number of fragments by combining them as received.

lowpanInReasmOKs.name: lowpanInReasmOKs
lowpanInReasmOKs.description: The number of IPv6 packets successfully reassembled.

lowpanInCompReqds.name: lowpanInCompReqds
lowpanInCompReqds.description: The number of 6LoWPAN datagrams requiring header decompression.

lowpanInCompFails.name: lowpanInCompFails
lowpanInCompFails.description: The number of 6LoWPAN datagrams where header decompression failed (e.g., because the necessary context information was not available).

lowpanInCompOKs.name: lowpanInCompOKs
lowpanInCompOKs.description: The number of 6LoWPAN datagrams where header decompression was successful.

lowpanInDiscards.name: lowpanInDiscards
lowpanInDiscards.description: The number of received 6LoWPAN datagrams that were discarded (e.g., for lack of buffer space) even though no problems were encountered to prevent their continued processing. Note that this counter does not include any datagrams discarded due to a reassembly failure or a compression failure.

lowpanInDelivers.name: lowpanInDelivers
lowpanInDelivers.description: The total number of IPv6 packets successfully delivered to the IPv6 layer.

lowpanOutRequests.name: lowpanOutRequests
lowpanOutRequests.description: The total number of IPv6 packets supplied by the IPv6 layer.

lowpanOutCompReqds.name: lowpanOutCompReqds
lowpanOutCompReqds.description: The total number of IPv6 packets for which header compression was attempted.

lowpanOutCompFails.name: lowpanOutCompFails
lowpanOutCompFails.description: The total number of IPv6 packets for which header compression failed.

lowpanOutCompOKs.name: lowpanOutCompOKs
lowpanOutCompOKs.description: The total number of IPv6 packets for which header compression was successful.

lowpanOutFragReqds.name: lowpanOutFragReqds
lowpanOutFragReqds.description: The number of IPv6 packets that required fragmentation in order to be transmitted.

lowpanOutFragFails.name: lowpanOutFragFails
lowpanOutFragFails.description: The number of IPv6 packets that have been discarded because fragmentation failed.

lowpanOutFragOKs.name: lowpanOutFragOKs
lowpanOutFragOKs.description: The number of IPv6 packets that have been successfully fragmented.

lowpanOutFragCreates.name: lowpanOutFragCreates
lowpanOutFragCreates.description: The number of 6LoWPAN fragments that have been generated as a result of fragmentation. This includes both FRAG1 and FRAGN 6LoWPAN datagrams.

lowpanOutMeshHopLimitExceeds.name: lowpanOutMeshHopLimitExceeds
lowpanOutMeshHopLimitExceeds.description: The number of 6LoWPAN datagrams with a MESH header that were dropped because the hop limit was exceeded.

lowpanOutMeshNoRoutes.name: lowpanOutMeshNoRoutes
lowpanOutMeshNoRoutes.description: The number of 6LoWPAN datagrams with a MESH header that were dropped because there was no forwarding information available.

lowpanOutMeshRequests.name: lowpanOutMeshRequests
lowpanOutMeshRequests.description: The number of 6LoWPAN datagrams requiring MESH header encapsulation.

lowpanOutMeshForwds.name: lowpanOutMeshForwds
lowpanOutMeshForwds.description: The number of 6LoWPAN datagrams with a MESH header for which suitable forwarding information was available.

lowpanOutMeshTransmits.name: lowpanOutMeshTransmits
lowpanOutMeshTransmits.description: The number of 6LoWPAN datagrams with a MESH header created.

lowpanOutDiscards.name: lowpanOutDiscards
lowpanOutDiscards.description: The number of IPv6 packets that were discarded (e.g., for lack of buffer space) even though no problem was encountered to prevent their transmission to their destination.

lowpanOutTransmits.name: lowpanOutTransmits
lowpanOutTransmits.description: The total number of 6LoWPAN datagram that this entity supplied to the lower layers for transmission.

lowpanIfStatsEntry.name: lowpanIfStatsEntry
lowpanIfStatsEntry.description: An entry providing statistics for a specific interface.

lowpanIfReasmTimeout.name: lowpanIfReasmTimeout
lowpanIfReasmTimeout.description: The maximum number of seconds that received fragments are held while they are awaiting reassembly at this interface.

lowpanIfInReceives.name: lowpanIfInReceives
lowpanIfInReceives.description: The total number of 6LoWPAN datagrams received on this interface, including those received in error.

lowpanIfInHdrErrors.name: lowpanIfInHdrErrors
lowpanIfInHdrErrors.description: The number of 6LoWPAN datagrams received on this interface that were discarded due to errors in their headers, including unknown dispatch values.

lowpanIfInMeshReceives.name: lowpanIfInMeshReceives
lowpanIfInMeshReceives.description: The number of 6LoWPAN datagrams received on this interface with a MESH header.

lowpanIfInMeshForwds.name: lowpanIfInMeshForwds
lowpanIfInMeshForwds.description: The number of 6LoWPAN datagrams received on this interface requiring mesh forwarding.

lowpanIfInMeshDelivers.name: lowpanIfInMeshDelivers
lowpanIfInMeshDelivers.description: The number of 6LoWPAN datagrams received on this interface with a MESH header delivered to the local system.

lowpanIfInReasmReqds.name: lowpanIfInReasmReqds
lowpanIfInReasmReqds.description: The number of 6LoWPAN fragments received on this interface that needed to be reassembled. This includes both FRAG1 and FRAGN 6LoWPAN datagrams.

lowpanIfInReasmFails.name: lowpanIfInReasmFails
lowpanIfInReasmFails.description: The number of failures detected by the reassembly algorithm (e.g., timeouts) for datagrams received on this interface. Note that this is not necessarily a count of discarded 6LoWPAN fragments since implementations can lose track of the number of fragments by combining them as received.

lowpanIfInReasmOKs.name: lowpanIfInReasmOKs
lowpanIfInReasmOKs.description: The number of IPv6 packets successfully reassembled from fragments received on this interface.

lowpanIfInCompReqds.name: lowpanIfInCompReqds
lowpanIfInCompReqds.description: The number of 6LoWPAN datagrams received on this interface requiring header decompression.

lowpanIfInCompFails.name: lowpanIfInCompFails
lowpanIfInCompFails.description: The number of 6LoWPAN datagrams received on this interface where header decompression failed (e.g., because the necessary context information was not available).

lowpanIfInCompOKs.name: lowpanIfInCompOKs
lowpanIfInCompOKs.description: The number of 6LoWPAN datagrams received on this interface where header decompression was successful.

lowpanIfInDiscards.name: lowpanIfInDiscards
lowpanIfInDiscards.description: The number of 6LoWPAN datagrams received on this interface that were discarded (e.g., for lack of buffer space) even though no problems were encountered to prevent their continued processing. Note that this counter does not include any datagrams discarded due to a reassembly failure or a compression failure.

lowpanIfInDelivers.name: lowpanIfInDelivers
lowpanIfInDelivers.description: The total number of IPv6 packets received on this interface that were successfully delivered to the IPv6 layer.

lowpanIfOutRequests.name: lowpanIfOutRequests
lowpanIfOutRequests.description: The total number of IPv6 packets supplied by the IPv6 layer to be sent over this interface.

lowpanIfOutCompReqds.name: lowpanIfOutCompReqds
lowpanIfOutCompReqds.description: The total number of IPv6 packets to be sent over this interface for which header compression was attempted.

lowpanIfOutCompFails.name: lowpanIfOutCompFails
lowpanIfOutCompFails.description: The total number of IPv6 packets to be sent over this interface for which header compression failed.

lowpanIfOutCompOKs.name: lowpanIfOutCompOKs
lowpanIfOutCompOKs.description: The total number of IPv6 packets to be sent over this interface for which header compression was successful.

lowpanIfOutFragReqds.name: lowpanIfOutFragReqds
lowpanIfOutFragReqds.description: The number of IPv6 packets to be sent over this interface that required fragmentation in order to be transmitted.

lowpanIfOutFragFails.name: lowpanIfOutFragFails
lowpanIfOutFragFails.description: The number of IPv6 packets to be sent over this interface that have been discarded because fragmentation failed.

lowpanIfOutFragOKs.name: lowpanIfOutFragOKs
lowpanIfOutFragOKs.description: The number of IPv6 packets to be sent over this interface that have been successfully fragmented.

lowpanIfOutFragCreates.name: lowpanIfOutFragCreates
lowpanIfOutFragCreates.description: The number of 6LoWPAN fragments that have been generated on this interface as a result of fragmentation. This includes both FRAG1 and FRAGN 6LoWPAN datagrams.

lowpanIfOutMeshHopLimitExceeds.name: lowpanIfOutMeshHopLimitExceeds
lowpanIfOutMeshHopLimitExceeds.description: The number of 6LoWPAN datagrams to be sent on this interface with a MESH header that were dropped because the hop limit was exceeded.

lowpanIfOutMeshNoRoutes.name: lowpanIfOutMeshNoRoutes
lowpanIfOutMeshNoRoutes.description: The number of 6LoWPAN datagrams to be sent on this interface with a MESH header that were dropped because there was no forwarding information available.

lowpanIfOutMeshRequests.name: lowpanIfOutMeshRequests
lowpanIfOutMeshRequests.description: The number of 6LoWPAN datagrams to be sent on this interface requiring MESH header encapsulation.

lowpanIfOutMeshForwds.name: lowpanIfOutMeshForwds
lowpanIfOutMeshForwds.description: The number of 6LoWPAN datagrams to be sent on this interface with a MESH header for which suitable forwarding information was available.

lowpanIfOutMeshTransmits.name: lowpanIfOutMeshTransmits
lowpanIfOutMeshTransmits.description: The number of 6LoWPAN datagrams to be sent on this interface with a MESH header created.

lowpanIfOutDiscards.name: lowpanIfOutDiscards
lowpanIfOutDiscards.description: The number of IPv6 packets to be sent over this interface that were discarded (e.g., for lack of buffer space) even though no problem was encountered to prevent their transmission to their destination.

lowpanIfOutTransmits.name: lowpanIfOutTransmits
lowpanIfOutTransmits.description: The total number of 6LoWPAN datagrams to be sent on this interface that this entity supplied to the lower layers for transmission.

lowpanCompliance.name: lowpanCompliance
lowpanCompliance.description: Compliance statement for systems that implement 6LoWPAN.

lowpanStatsGroup.name: lowpanStatsGroup
lowpanStatsGroup.description: A collection of objects providing information and statistics about the processing of 6LoWPAN datagrams, excluding counters covering the processing of datagrams with a MESH header.

lowpanStatsMeshGroup.name: lowpanStatsMeshGroup
lowpanStatsMeshGroup.description: A collection of objects providing information and statistics about the processing of 6LoWPAN datagrams with a MESH header.

lowpanIfStatsGroup.name: lowpanIfStatsGroup
lowpanIfStatsGroup.description: A collection of objects providing per-interface information and statistics about the processing of 6LoWPAN datagrams, excluding counters covering the processing of datagrams with a MESH header.

lowpanIfStatsMeshGroup.name: lowpanIfStatsMeshGroup
lowpanIfStatsMeshGroup.description: A collection of objects providing per-interface information and statistics about the processing of 6LoWPAN datagrams with a MESH header.
